name: Pizza Warfare
description:
Become the olives king by fighting against all the other pizza ingredients!

A short game prototype made for Houdini game-jam in about a weekend.

Houdini pizza asset: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dU8yELLF4S-jvThMKt8-5KynT5zA6P0a/view?usp=shari...

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • LMB - shoot

Credits

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - Lighting, Houdini assets

Natalia Sedova (@luchok___) - 3D assets

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - Programming

Olive icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
